vo-dml:model.name: mango
vo-dml:model.description: Data model based oon components and data association for source data
vo-dml:model.title: Mango
vo-dml:model.author: Laurent Michel, Fran??ois Bonnarel, Gilles Landais, Mireille Louys, Marco Molinaro, Jesue Salgado

enumeration.description: Possible options to encode a shape in a string.

enumeration.name: CalibrationLevel
enumeration.description: Science ready data with the instrument signature removed (ObsCore).

literal.name: Raw
literal.description: Raw instrumental data, in a proprietary or internal data provider defined format, that needs instrument specific tools to be handled (ObsCore).

literal.name: Instrumental
literal.description: Instrumental data in a standard format which could be manipulated with standard astronomical packages (ObsCore).

literal.name: Calibrated
literal.description: Science ready data with the instrument signature removed (ObsCore).

objectType.name: Source
objectType.description: Root class of the model. MANGO instance are meant of be Source instances. A source has an identifier and two docks: one for the parameters and one for the associated data.

attribute.name: identifier
attribute.description: Unique identifier for a Source. The uniqueness of that identifier is not managed by the model. The format is free.

composition.name: associatedDataDock
composition.description: Composition link pointing on all data associated with the source.

composition.name: propertyDock
composition.description: Composition link pointing on all parameters attached to the source.

objectType.name: AssociatedData
objectType.description: Abstract reference to a particular dataset associated to the Source. This class is used to specify the type of the dataset as well as its role.

attribute.name: semantic
attribute.description: Reference to a semantic concept giving the nature of the associated data. As long as the vocabulary is not set, the possible values of this attribute are given by the LinkSemantic enumeration.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: Free text description of the associated data

objectType.name: WebEndpoint
objectType.description: Class for associated data referenced by an URL

attribute.name: ContentType
attribute.description: Mime type of the URL

attribute.name: url
attribute.description: Web endpoint

objectType.name: AssociatedMangoInstance
objectType.description: Reference to another MANGO instance that is part of the associated data.

composition.name: mangoInstance
composition.description: Composition link pointing on one MANGO instance associated with the source.

objectType.name: Property
objectType.description: Reference to a particular measure of the Source. This class is used to specify the type of the measure as well as its role.

attribute.name: semantic
attribute.description: Reference to a semantic concept giving the nature of the parameter As long as the vocabulary is not set, the possible values of this attribute are given by the ParamSemantic enumeration.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: Free text description of the measure

package.name: exterrors
package.description: This package contains all \texttt{meas:Error} class extensions

primitiveType.name: DiagElems2x2
primitiveType.description: Datatype containing the 2 diagonal elements of a 2x2 matrix. Attributes are named $\sigma$ because this datatype is mostly used in the context of complex errors.

objectType.name: MultiParamError
objectType.description: This class models errors with possible correlations between different axes and with errors of associated parameters. The standard use-case for such errors is a positional error where e.g. errors on position, proper motion and parallax are correlated to each other.

attribute.name: confidenceLevel
attribute.description: Error confidence level, expressed in $\sigma$.

attribute.name: unit
attribute.description: Unit of the variance or the error ellipse

composition.name: correlatedErrors
composition.description: Relation linking the host parameter error with all correlated errors.

objectType.name: CorrelatedError
objectType.description: Correlation coefficients between the error of the host parameter and one of its associated parameters. The host parameter is one of the \texttt{mango:Parameter} of the \texttt{mango:ParameterDock} (a position typically) of the Mango object. The associated parameter is one of the \texttt{mango:Parameter.associatedParameters} of that parameter (typically a proper motion) There is no logical link between the correlated error instance and the associated parameter it refers to. The associated parameter is identified by the \texttt{UCD field}. The client is in charge of solving this dependency.

attribute.name: ucd
attribute.description: UCD of the associated parameter. This UCD must be identical to this of the associated parameter the \texttt{CorrelatedError} refers to.

objectType.name: CorrelatedError1D1D
objectType.description: Correlation coefficients between the error of one 1D host parameter and a one 1D associated parameters.

attribute.name: correlation1_1
attribute.description: Correlation between the error on the first axis of the host parameter and the error on the first axis of the associated parameter. The covariance is given by $cov_{XY}=corr_{XY}\sigma_{X}\sigma_{Y}$

objectType.name: Ellipse
objectType.description: Elliptical error. The regular ellipse orientation is East of the North

attribute.name: semiMajorAxis
attribute.description: Semi major axis of the ellipse. The unit is given by \texttt{mango:errors.MultiParamError.unit}

attribute.name: semiMinorAxis
attribute.description: Semi minor axis of the ellipse. The unit is given by \texttt{mango:errors.MultiParamError.unit}

attribute.name: positionAngle
attribute.description: Ellipse orientation, relative to the East of the North.

objectType.name: CorrMatrix2x2
objectType.description: Variance matrix with correlation between errors on individual axes.

attribute.name: correlation
attribute.description: Correlation between the errors on the 2 axes. The covariance is given by $cov_{XY}=corr_{XY}\sigma_{X}\sigma_{Y}$

attribute.name: diagMatrix
attribute.description: Diagonal elements of the matrix. The unit is given by \texttt{mango:error.MultiParamError.unit}

objectType.name: DiagMatrix2x2
objectType.description: Simple diagonal matrix of variances

attribute.name: diagMatrix
attribute.description: Diagonal elements of the matrix. The unit is given by \texttt{mango:errors.MultiParamError.unit}

objectType.name: MultiParamError1D
objectType.description: This class models errors on a one axis parameter with possible correlations with errors on associated parameters. A classical use-case is an error on a radial velocity that is coupled with an error on the proper motion.

attribute.name: sigma
attribute.description: Variance of the parameter error. The unit is given by \texttt{mango:errors.MultiParamError.unit}

objectType.name: Correlated2D1D
objectType.description: Correlation coefficients between the error of a 1D host parameter and a 2D associated parameters.

attribute.name: correlation2_1
attribute.description: Correlation between the error on the first axis of the host parameter and the error on the second axis of the associated parameter. The covariance is given by $cov_{XY}=corr_{XY}\sigma_{X}\sigma_{Y}$

objectType.name: CorrelatedError1D2D
objectType.description: Correlation coefficients between the error of one 2D host parameter and one 1D associated parameters.

attribute.name: correlation1_1
attribute.description: Correlation between the error on the first axis of the host parameter and the error on the associated parameter. The covariance is given by $cov_{XY}=corr_{XY}\sigma_{X}\sigma_{Y}$

attribute.name: correlation1_2
attribute.description: Correlation between the error on the second axis of the host parameter and the error on the associated parameter. The covariance is given by $cov_{XY}=corr_{XY}\sigma_{X}\sigma_{Y}$

objectType.name: CorrelatedError2D2D
objectType.description: Correlation coefficients between the error of a 2D host parameter and a 2D associated parameters.

attribute.name: correlation2_1
attribute.description: Correlation between the error on the first axis of the host parameter and the error on the second axis of the associated parameter. The covariance is given by $cov_{XY}=corr_{XY}\sigma_{X}\sigma_{Y}$

attribute.name: correlation2_2
attribute.description: Correlation between the error on the second axis of the host parameter and the error on the second axis of the associated parameter. The covariance is given by $cov_{XY}=corr_{XY}\sigma_{X}\sigma_{Y}$

objectType.name: MultParamErro2D
objectType.description: This class models errors on a one 2 axes parameter with possible correlations with errors on associated parameters. A classical use-case is an error on a position that is coupled with errors on the proper motion and/or the parralax.

package.name: extmeas
package.description: This package contains all \texttt{meas} class extensions
